activities: Education Management Corporation and its U.S. subsidiaries other than The Connecting Link II LLC participate in Safe Harbor in connection with the transfer of personal information from the EU/EEA/and or Switzerland in furtherance of our education programs.  Argosy University, The Art Institutes, Brown Mackie College, and South University are EDMC education systems among those that participate as subsidiaries of EDMC.  Personal information which may be transferred to the U.S. includes personal information about prospective applicants, applicants, students, alumni, and others interested in EDMC offerings.
contacttitle1: VP, Chief Privacy Officer & Transactions Counsel
corpofftitle1: VP Chief Privacy Officer & Transactions Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, offline, manually processed data about prospective applicants, applicants, students, alumni and others interested in EDMC offerings
